user.title: Set up WiFi geolocation
user.description: Configure WiFi geolocation using Google Geolocation API. Get an API key at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate WiFi geolocation
reauth_confirm.description: The API key authentication failed. Please provide a valid Google Geolocation API key.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Google Geolocation API
